document.full_text: an indonesian plane carrying 27 people crashed into the sea off the remote papua province, the transport ministry said saturday, and media said at least 15 people were killed.
document.title: at least 15 die as plane crashes off indonesia's papua: report
lines_and_colors: an indonesian plane carrying 27 people crashed into the sea off the remote papua province, the transport ministry said saturday, and media said at least 15 people were killed.
